Step 1 of 3

Let’s get you a wallet to invest

The simplest way to access PeakDeFi is to create a wallet with Argent wallet. Learn why in our FAQ.

Download the app

I have already a wallet

PeakDeFi exists on the Ethereum blockchain, which uses similar technology to Bitcoin to guarantee that you own and control your assets. To interact with the Ethereum blockchain, you need a wallet like Argent.

Transactions related to your PeakDeFi operations on Ethereum cost “gas”, which are micro amounts of Ethereum’s native cryptocurrency (Ether).

Step 1 of 3
Done
Step 2 of 3

Buy crypto

Investing on PeakDeFi requires ETH (Ethereum’s native cryptocurrency) or ERC20 tokens. You can buy ETH or the supported ERC20 tokens with your credit card via Wyre and Argent. Then, you are ready to invest on PeakDeFi.

Buy via Wyre

Buy via Argent

Back
Step 2 of 3
Done
Step 3 of 3

Connect Argent to PeakDeFi

1

Open Peakdefi.com on your laptop and look for the option to connect a wallet.

2

Select WalletConnect among the connect options. You will be presented with a QR code.

3

Open your Argent app and tap Scan on your Assets screen at the top.

4

Scan the QR code. You will be prompted to authorize the Dapp in your Argent wallet.

Back
Step 3 of 3
Invest

Frequently Asked Questions

What does blockchain technology mean?

PeakDeFi exists on the Ethereum blockchain, which uses similar technology to Bitcoin to guarantee that you own and control your assets. To interact with the Ethereum blockchain, you need a wallet like Argent.

Why the Ethereum blockchain?

Ethereum is a general-purpose blockchain with smart contracts that enable programmable tokens, like PeakDeFi funds shares, which represents your assets under management in PeakDeFi.

How is this built?

On Ethereum, PeakDeFi is run by a suite of smart contracts that manage your balances and assets.

PeakDeFi smart contracts are audited and secured by different audit partners.

What is gas?

Transactions related to your PeakDeFi operations on Ethereum cost “gas”, which are micro amounts of Ethereum’s native cryptocurrency (Ether).

Need more help?

The Ethereum blockchain

PeakDeFi exists on the Ethereum blockchain, which uses similar technology to Bitcoin to guarantee that you own and control your assets. To interact with the Ethereum blockchain, you need a wallet like Argent.

Transactions related to your PeakDeFi operations on Ethereum cost “gas”, which are micro amounts of Ethereum’s native cryptocurrency (Ether).

Let’s get you a wallet to stake

The simplest way to earn staking rewards on PeakDeFi is to create a wallet with Argent wallet. Learn why in our FAQ.

Download the app

I have already a wallet

PeakDeFi exists on the Ethereum blockchain, which uses similar technology to Bitcoin to guarantee that you own and control your assets. To interact with the Ethereum blockchain, you need a wallet like Argent.

Transactions related to your PeakDeFi operations on Ethereum cost “gas”, which are micro amounts of Ethereum’s native cryptocurrency (Ether).

Done
Step 2 of 5

Buy crypto

Earning staking reward on PeakDeFi requires ETH (Ethereum’s native cryptocurrency). You can buy ETH with your credit card via Wyre or Argent. Then, you are ready to stake.

Buy via Wyre

Buy via Argent

Step 3 of 5

Connect Argent to PeakDeFi

1

Open Peakdefi.com on your laptop and look for the option to connect a wallet.

2

Select WalletConnect among the connect options. You will be presented with a QR code.

3

Open your Argent app and tap Scan on your Assets screen at the top.

4

Scan the QR code. You will be prompted to authorize the Dapp in your Argent wallet.

Back
Step 3 of 5
Done
Step 4 of 5

Staking your PEAK to earn rewards

Peak holders stake PEAK in return for rewards from the system’s inflationary monetary policy and the referral program.

1

If you have staked your PEAK, you are eligible to collect two kinds of rewards: staking rewards, and referral rewards generated via the PeakDeFi ecosystem.

2

Frequently Asked Questions

What does blockchain technology mean?

PeakDeFi exists on the Ethereum blockchain, which uses similar technology to Bitcoin to guarantee that you own and control your assets. To interact with the Ethereum blockchain, you need a wallet like Argent.

Why the Ethereum blockchain?

Ethereum is a general-purpose blockchain with smart contracts that enable programmable tokens, like PeakDeFi funds shares, which represents your assets under management in PeakDeFi.

How is this built?

On Ethereum, PeakDeFi is run by a suite of smart contracts that manage your balances and assets.

PeakDeFi smart contracts are audited and secured by different audit partners.

What is gas?

Transactions related to your PeakDeFi operations on Ethereum cost “gas”, which are micro amounts of Ethereum’s native cryptocurrency (Ether).
